name: Welcome to the University: Student's Revenge
name_original: Welcome to the University: Student's Revenge
description:
Welcome to the University: Student's Revenge is a thriller style game with learning purposes. There are elements of hacking and cracking. What is more game is kept in realistic formula so you have to meet the basic human needs like eating, drinking or going to the toilet.

To be honest the inspiration of this project is Welcome to the Game production by Reflect Studios. There are several threats to the player. The Keeper, The Network Administrator and the Thieves.

The main goal of the game is to hack and expose university passwords and get access to the secret information that are available only for high ranked workers. The player can use password cracker, network attacks and VPN connections to do so.
